page.title: 17Mrs. Dale the School Nurse.
page.content: {Mrs Dale}works for the{Soham Health {Centre}and visits local school at Wicken, Soham,{Fordham,}Isleham and Kennet.She checks your hair, teeth, fingernails and{eyesight.}She is also the{welfare lady}which means that she talks to children who do not want to go to school and tries to sort out their{problems.}Her job{pays}about {Â£5000}to{Â£6000}a year on grade 2 and {Â£10000}to{Â£12000}at grade 1. Mrs Dale has about{2000 children}to look after and tries to visit them{each term. {Girls}and{boys}get the same number of head lice but children get more than adults. She finds more head lice in the{Winter time}because the weather is colder. She will sometimes keep the lice as examples.{Mrs. Dale}is married with{two}grown up{children.}She enjoys her{work very much.
